Enjoyed alot. The food quality is so good. Also the service is good. I was late to go there so it was their wrap up time. Hence I had to hurry. But the waiter took the orders properly and served them quick.

A lovely restaurant with patio dining by the river. The quality of the service is good. The food is delicious; I especially enjoy their flavorful masala rice. Fish and other foods are also quite delicious.
